duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform monthly financial close activities including preparing journal entries, financial reporting, and reconciliations.
Update and monitor key performance indicators and financial metrics, analyzing variances and communicating the financial impact on transportation costs.
Produce reporting to provide accurate and timely financial information to management for decision making purposes.
Provide senior management and operations teams with in-depth financial analysis of actual spend to drive insights on trends and optimize costs.
Deliver ad hoc reporting and analysis as required.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Accounting or Finance
